sense.def:
Air
je mešanica plinov, iz katerih je sestavljeno zemeljsko ozračje in ki jo dihamo.

seg.quote: She took a gulp of air.

sense.def:
The air
je prostor okoli predmetov nad zemljo.

seg.quote: My dog was lying on the floor with its feet in the air.
The smell of cooking filled the air.

sense.def:
Beseda
air
se nanaša na potovanja z letalom.

seg.quote: The fare by air from London to Luxembourg is £145 return.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo ali nekaj
has a particular air
daje tak splošni vtis.

seg.quote: He has a faintly old-fashioned air.

sense.def:
To air one's opinions
pomeni seznaniti druge s svojim mnenjem.

seg.quote: He spoke on the radio, airing his views to the nation.

sense.def:
To air a room
pomeni v sobo spustiti svež zrak.

Kadar človek
airs clothing
ali kadar
clothing airs
pomeni, da postavimo obleko na toplo, da se do kraja posuši.

To disappear into thin air
pomeni popolnoma izginiti.

To appear out of thin air
pomeni prikazati se nenadoma in skrivnostno.

cit.quote: pojaviti se kot strela z jasnega, pasti z neba

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
on the air
nastopa na radiu ali televiziji.

cit.quote: na radiu ali televiziji, v etru
